message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper focuses on video captioning, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a new language decoder using advanced components such as binary gates and soft attention, which falls under the scope of machine learning and deep learning. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with video data, which is a multimedia content, and hence, cs.MM (Multimedia) is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a novel approach for video captioning, which involves generating captions from videos, and hence, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a possible sub-category.
